channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #AnantAmbani and #RadhikaMerch
item.description: #AnantAmbani and #RadhikaMerchant’s big fat Indian #wedding saw #AkashAmbani on #dad duty.

item.title: A #baker posted a #video of ma
item.description: A #baker posted a #video of making fresh #bread from scratch while being on a #plane, which is now being slammed by many on #socialmedia

item.title: #Bangladesh’s interim governme
item.description: #Bangladesh’s interim government lifted a #ban that was imposed on #Jamaat-e-Islami and its student wing #BangladeshIslamiChhatrashibir by the #SheikhHasina regime
